findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized access or malicious activities.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is not protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected permit function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityWithPermit and removeLiquidityETHWithPermit functions are unprotected, allowing unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap functions (e.g., swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens) are unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any protection mechanism, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The constructor of a contract can be called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected renounceOwnership function
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function can be called by anyone, allowing them to relinquish ownership of the contract without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected transferOwnership function
findings.description: The smart contract owner can execute transfer of contract ownership to a specified wallet or a dead address without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected distributeDogeCoinDividends function
findings.description: The distributeDogeCoinDividends function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is public and can be accessed by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized users to withdraw dividends.

findings.title: Unprotected _withdrawDividendOfUser function
findings.description: The _withdrawDividendOfUser function is unprotected and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The smart contract allows the owner to mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _setBalance function
findings.description: The _setBalance function is accessible by anyone and can be exploited to manipulate balances.
